1.0.1.name: wordpress/pinterest-for-thecartpress
1.0.1.description:
Lets your customers share your products on the largest social pinboard for Shoppers.

The plugin allows to add the "Pin it" button in your products. If you have your Pinterest account connecting with Twitter or Facebook, your catalogues could be shared in both social networks.

TheCartPress Pinterest allows to display the "Pin it" button in products, post or any other custom post type.

Unlimited features

  • TheCartPress-Pinterest is compatible with TheCartPress and has been developed by TheCartPress Team.

More info and Community

  • TheCartPress Extend: plugins, themes and custom development
  • TheCartPress Demo
  • TheCartPress Community/Support
  • TheCartPress Site
